description: I am always that person that wants to get friends of mine to meet other friends of mine, but it can be hard to get them all together. I have run into the issue multiple times trying to get groups together to go disc golfing. I send out a text to get one together, and have to wait to hear from everyone back, if they can't do it, then I text the next group seeing if they can, so on and so forth. This ineffeciency drove me crazy. It shouldn't be this hard to get together with friends out side of the digital world, when we are so connected on there.ellat itaque?
plan: To solve this problem, I brought it up as a school project, and we created an app, 'In Or Out' that takes out a lot of the frustrations by allowing users to create an activity card that other friends can join in on. I am now working on focusing a more in depth application based on this just for Disc Golf.
